glossentry.glossterm:
Culti
With just a little bit of care and preparation, any flower garden can be a vibrantly colored environment. Flowers can be selected for specific blooming seasons, colors and shapes. Both annual and perennial flower gardens can be planted depending on climate and specific needs.
var
glossentry.glossdef:
A cultivar is a cultivated plant that has been selected and given a unique name because of its decorative or useful characteristics; it is us
With just a little bit of care and preparation, any flower garden can be a vibrantly colored environment. Flowers can be selected for specific blooming seasons, colors and shapes. Both annual and perennial flower gardens can be planted depending on climate and specific needs.ually distinct from similar plants and when propagated it retains those characteristics. The word cultivar is generally regarded as a portmanteau of "cultivated" and "variety", but could also be derived from "cultigen" "variety".
